channel.title: Fractize - Roxoscape/Arcpkz remake
channel.description:
I havent really been active on this project lately so i wanted to release it so someone else who loved any of these servers would keep work on them im currently working on my 718 but a slow progress im mostly playing fps games atm. Lets just go right into it.
Some extra features not added in media: Pvp mode Donor ranks More cant really remember right now x(
[B]Updates[/B] [CODE]29 march 2015 Some coords fixed on safe zones 28 march 2015 Dad Teleport to yanille 27 march 2015 Players in pvp mode can't drop items Pvm/Pvp modes got different respawn & home locations Random pvp loot in safe pk Players keep items in safe pk 25 march 2015 Godwars Fixed void equip slots different playmodes cant trade/duel eachother 24 march 2015 PvP zone in varrock New start location Chose between pvp/pvm mode on start 23 march 2015 Redberry pie cooking 22 march 2015 Falador castle staircases Falador castle Ladders Almost finished the knights sword quest Fixed falador castle door Fixed varrock palace library door 21 march 2015 started the knights sword quest Main cities teleport 20 march 2015 Added morrigans to cave shop PvP morrigans bonuses Minigames teleport Donator rank Long dclaws spec New Launcher buttons 19 march 2015 D claws spec Fixed drop items Avas attractor does not drop bolts on ground anymore Added corporeal beast Added all customs from roxoscape Chaos elemental drops d claws 18 march 2015 increased monkey guards defence&hitpoints 16 march 2015 The homemade stuff store Robe store Full set collections store General store Changed some prices 15 march 2015 The legendary cave shop Pking points exchange shop King black dragon portal Chaos elemental & edge teleport Altars at home Lower exp rates Client updater/launcher Yell command 14 march 2015 Fixed quest cape as cape and not a weapon Monkey guard drops FractizeTicket shop Monkey guards Added gfx to blow kiss emote New home in falador Fixed jack latern mask as hat and not a weapon Fixed vyrewatch top as top and not a weapon[/CODE]
Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SLSF0qq.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ls9Jdnq.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hkJ1Hsv.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5judX5v.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f4KhpBf.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Szxhoqh.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xx4lfHl.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gKyfLPM.png[/img]
Downloads: Client; [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!aUdCFLaB!miDbw4bLjdyEj2WPniIEy1CCPz2iCAZ7vwnqx_8wZBA]https://mega.co.nz/#!aUdCFLaB!miDbw4bLjdyEj2WPniIEy1CCPz2iCAZ7vwnqx_8wZBA[/url] Source: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!2VtDDBzD!g_J2aPWGbGVYuAocczaDt6hPvGimnt_1mNXE_xPkouo]https://mega.co.nz/#!2VtDDBzD!g_J2aPWGbGVYuAocczaDt6hPvGimnt_1mNXE_xPkouo[/url] Cache: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!HZE3QRZA!al4v6-bOGUNoyvkjpNRjvgvmwemzTiUnpNxQuEfC6IM]https://mega.co.nz/#!HZE3QRZA!al4v6-bOGUNoyvkjpNRjvgvmwemzTiUnpNxQuEfC6IM[/url]
More can be found here: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/589076-fractize-roxoscape-remake.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/projects/589076-fractize-roxoscape-remake.html[/url]

item.title: Fractize - Roxoscape/Arcpkz remake
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

khayam:

like all the walls on buildings r messed up and bare wierd when you walking to bank the roof donts dissappear so you can see where you are in buildings, this is just in falador

Sounds like the model is being overwritten by a custom or whatnot.

Read full topic

item.title: Fractize - Roxoscape/Arcpkz remake
item.dc:creator: @ayeitswill ayeitswill
item.description:
@ayeitswill wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:3, topic:551215”][quote author=ritvarzzzz link=topic=670132.msg4481105#msg4481105 date=1429872092]
The customs are horrible…
[/quote]

Do you mean the inventory zooms, or the customs in general?[/quote]
I would say the inventory zoom but they just need to be adjusted. No problems! looks awesome love to see some custom content! Love customs.

Read full topic

I havent really been active on this project lately so i wanted to release it so someone else who loved any of these servers would keep work on them im currently working on my 718 but a slow progress im mostly playing fps games atm.

Some extra features not added in media:
